name: Gallowglass - The REDACTED Job
description:
When a team of down on their luck private military contractors are offered the contract of a lifetime they jump at the opportunity, but quickly learn that you should always read the fine print. Now backed into a corner they must use all of the combined skills and experience to pick up their paycheck.

A 2d, narrative driven interactive fiction game, Gallowglass - The REDACTED Job, puts the player in the shoes of the contractors from Gallowglass Security Solutions. 

This is a vertical slice of Gallowglass - The REDACTED Job, with the rest of the game currently in on going development, final art style may change before launch.

 Any feedback would be greatly appreciated

Contactable @ gallowglassgamesstudio@gmail.com
